summary: Adventurer Allan Quartermain leads an expedition into uncharted African territory in an attempt to locate an explorer who went missing during his search for the fabled diamond mines of King Solomon.
cast: Deborah Kerr|Stewart Granger|Richard Carlson|Hugo Haas|Lowell Gilmore|Kimursi|Siriaque|Sekaryongo|Baziga|Munto Anampio|John Banner|Benempinga|Gutare|Ivargwema|Henry Rowland
